description: Grafana dashboard for Qdrant clusters deployed on Qdrant Cloud Platform.

targets.expr: avg(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container="$container"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod,container) / avg(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container="$container", resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (pod,container)

min(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", resource="cpu", unit="core"}/kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", resource="cpu", unit="core"})

max by (pod,container) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container="$container"}) / max by (pod,container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container="$container",resource="memory",unit="byte"})

panels.title: Memory usage: Relative to limit (working set)

targets.expr: max by (pod) (qdrant_node_rssanon_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}) / max by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container="qdrant",resource="memory",unit="byte"})

panels.title: Memory: Size of memory mapped files (mmap)
Data Disk: Usage relative to limit
Snapshot Disk: Usage relative to limit

title: Qdrant Cloud Dashboard
